attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop all motorbility cars to all the people who really can get around and only give them to the people who really need them like wheelchair users as they are giving them out to anyone without proper investigation they should be only with chair access ramps and be stickered up to allow priority at all car parks no more brand new cars and any make it is making a mug of the oridinary man in the street
